body: I don't know, I was speechless reading this. But the author has a unique drawing style af

When I first saw this artist works, the first thing I notice is the weird character face is. The face art was just not up my alley or even in my first times reading: ugly, but they always deliver a intense sex scenes! Now I just think of it as 18master unique art characteristic I guess, not because he can't draw decent face. 

They're a lot of artists gifted to draw better decent or even handsome pretty faces but the sex scene is just terribly bland or horrifying. There're artists who can draw both amazingly but sadly not really a lot (Imo).

But if I gotta choose then the one with hotter sex scene would be better cause I come here for that.  If I need better arts, there're thousands out there but not all is gifted for smutty works. ;)
Idk why, but 18master's cartoon be like face art style is what makes his works uniquely hot.
